name: Pteranodon
description: A large beast resembling a prehistoric flying reptile, the Pteranodon is an agile threat with wings spread wide.
memorable: Utilizes its Flyby ability to swoop down on unsuspecting prey without incurring attacks.
goals: Hunt and catch its prey with quick aerial maneuvers.
relations: May be found in the company of other airborne or predatory creatures.
environment: Typically found in open skies or coastal areas.
strengths: Quick movement allows for strategic combat advantages and ability to avoid attacks.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma limits its interactions and strategic complexity.
attacks: Utilizes a bite attack that deals piercing damage, striking from a reach of 5 feet.
most_powerful_ability: Flyby ability allows it to escape without provoking opportunity attacks when flying.
skills: Possesses a basic proficiency in Perception, indicating an average awareness.
additional_information: Easily recognizable due to its prehistoric appearance.
test_queries: nimble aerial predator with a bite attack
agile creature that swoops to catch prey
large flying beast that avoids attacks
